item.title: 周一，班克斯的一幅新壁画吸引了大批人群来到伦敦的一条街道，甚至在这位难以捉摸的涂鸦艺术家确认这幅作品是他的作品之前。
item.description:
A new Banksy mural drew crowds to a London street on Monday, even before the elusive graffiti artist confirmed that the work was his. https://t.co/fDUracyfdM

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 前佐治亚州副州长杰夫-邓肯（Geoff Duncan）现在表示，他不会加入 "无标签 "组织可能在 2024 年总统竞选中推出的第三方 "团结 "选票。
item.description:
Former Georgia Lt. Gov. Geoff Duncan now says that he will not join No Labels' potential third-party "unity" ticket in the 2024 presidential race. https://t.co/OsDHma0CQm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 本周伊始，美国国会仍未达成协议，无法在周五截止日期前避免政府部分停摆。国土安全部的资金问题使谈判陷入僵局。
item.description:
Congress is beginning the week without a deal to avert a partial government shutdown by Friday's deadline. Funding for the Department of Homeland Security is tripping up negotiations.https://t.co/d3ZlMKlNGM

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统周一签署了一项行政命令，他说这标志着 "白宫有史以来第一项妇女健康研究倡议 "的启动，旨在 "开拓下一代科学研究和发现"。
item.description:
Pres. Biden signed an executive order Monday that he said marks the launch of "the first-ever White House initiative of women's health research", intended "to pioneer the next generation of scientific research and discovery." https://t.co/rXOEDec69w

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: @MattRiversABC 在海地太子港与我们会合，在最近发生的反对现任政府的武装叛乱中，我们驾车经过了一个首当其冲遭受帮派暴力的街区。
item.description:
.@MattRiversABC joins us from Port-au-Prince, Haiti, driving through one of the first neighborhoods to bear the brunt of gang violence during the recent armed rebellion against the sitting government. pic.twitter.com/zobSPo8oKj

— ABC News Live (@ABCNewsLive) March 18, 2024

item.title: 织物和工艺品零售商 Joann 已申请破产保护。这家总部位于俄亥俄州的公司在一份声明中表示，预计最早将于下月底摆脱破产：
item.description:
Fabric and crafts retailer Joann has filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection. The Ohio-based company said in a statement that it expected to emerge from bankruptcy as early as the end of next month.

Read more: https://t.co/9SNIJzEW3i pic.twitter.com/YC9L95ihyb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 继犹他州、加利福尼亚州、英格兰和罗马尼亚出现类似方尖碑之后，威尔士泥泞悬崖上新发现的一块 10 英尺高的银色巨石再次引发了人们对其起源的疯狂猜测。
item.description:
A newly discovered 10-foot-tall silver monolith on a muddy bluff in Wales has reignited wild speculation on its origin after similar obelisks appeared in Utah, California, England and Romania. https://t.co/DZskgzfv1m

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普在上周末的一次集会上向支持者发表了关于汽车行业的讲话，回击了对其 "血洗 "言论的批评。
item.description:

item.title: 据美国国家航空航天局（NASA）称，一颗罕见的巨大彗星将在71年后首次与地球擦肩而过，并可能在4月8日万众瞩目的日食期间出现。
item.description:
A rare and massive comet with a devilish nickname is set to pass by Earth for the first time in 71 years and may be visible during the highly anticipated solar eclipse on April 8, according to NASA. https://t.co/vQYE91ffj4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 新公布的视频显示，失踪大学生莱利-斯特恩（Riley Strain）在田纳西州纳什维尔市失踪当晚与一名警官进行了简短交谈。
item.description:

item.title: 纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）周一下令，在诉讼和官僚主义绊脚石严重阻碍合法市场并使黑市卖家猖獗之后，纽约将评估其陷入困境的娱乐用大麻许可计划。
item.description:
New York will evaluate its troubled recreational marijuana licensing program after lawsuits and bureaucratic stumbles severely hampered the legal market and allowed black-market sellers to flourish, Gov. Kathy Hochul ordered Monday. https://t.co/iCZioTehjq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 周一，全国有 70 多家企业关门歇业，以示团结，呼吁联邦实行带薪家庭假和医疗假。
item.description:
More than 70 businesses across the country shut their doors Monday in a show of solidarity to call for federal paid family and medical leave. https://t.co/LIxBoSmlyk

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 艾伦研究所的研究人员正在开展 "登月 "项目，比如绘制人脑地图，希望借此了解人体器官，帮助防治脑部疾病。
item.description:
Researchers at the Allen Institute are pursing "moonshot" projects, like mapping the human brain, in hopes of understanding the organ and to help fight brain diseases. https://t.co/RK06LceqFt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 北约旗帜在瑞典议会外升起，这个长期保持中立的国家的领导人将这一仪式誉为 "新时代"。

item.title: 美国环保局宣布全面禁止石棉，这种致癌物质仍被用于某些产品中，每年造成数万美国人死亡。

item.title: 新消息：据纳什维尔警方称，在继续寻找失踪的密苏里大学大学生莱利-斯特恩（Riley Strain）的过程中，没有发现任何犯规的证据。斯特莱恩于 3 月 8 日在纳什维尔游玩时，被一家酒吧赶出酒吧后失踪。
item.description:
NEW: No evidence of foul play has surfaced as work continues to locate missing Univ. of Missouri college student Riley Strain, according to Nashville PD.
Strain was visiting Nashville on March 8, when he went missing after being kicked out of a bar.https://t.co/Y9zdo9h69o

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）警告说，如果他不能在 11 月当选，美国将面临一场更广泛的 "流血冲突"，在此之后，这位前总统周一回击了批评，并将他对自己言论的辩护变成了筹款呼吁。
item.description:
After Donald Trump warned that the country would face a broader "bloodbath" if he's not elected in November, the former president on Monday pushed back on criticism and turned his defense of his comments into a fundraising appeal. https://t.co/QSlJh1nFBz

item.title: 其中一名医生说，韩国当局已吊销了两名资深医生的执照，原因是他们涉嫌煽动实习医生和住院医生举行长达数周的游行，导致医院运营中断。
item.description:
South Korean authorities have suspended the licenses of two senior doctors for allegedly inciting the weekslong walkouts by medical interns and residents that have disrupted hospital operations, one of the doctors said. https://t.co/FuculylxXL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 18, 2024
